intro.INTRO_TEXT: Turn your journey into a great adventure! Just choose your desired activity and destination, and we'll help you find the perfect guide for it.
intro.MOTO: "Life is meant for good friends and great adventures"

article1.title: BeSafe. BeWise. BeMyGuide
article1.body: support only certified, verified and handpicked local adventure guides and be in safe hands

article2.title: Real people with Real passions
article2.body: find like-minded guides with diverse personal interests and enjoy the human element of your adventures

article3.title: Personalized experiences
article3.body: tailor your next adventure together with your guide and be flexible while traveling all around the globe

activities.HEADING: No!limitsBe!Active
activities.CAPTION: Just choose the activity of your taste and we'll do the rest :)
